title: I FOUND HELMET BROS HELMET ON THE NEW MAP!!!
body: I don't care if I'm behind on this or im the first one, but i found fucking helmet bros helmet its in the raptors nest on the new SR!!!

replies.body: I told him not to jungle, but did he listen? "oh they're just wee little birds" he said. They're all the same.

Though jungle is under the night's shroud
and days are longer then night
Though Bro is just and proud
and our mind are hazy with blight

We shan't forget bright deeds
of him ho has fallen
We will honor his dead with meads
him, whose life was stollen.

- in honor of Helmet Bro

Let us remember him for his brave deeds, like when Vel'Koz tried to evaporate him and he didn't even blink, or when he stood as a bodyguard when Malphite ulted, or that time when Cassiopeia stunned him and his brothers. Let us never forget him, not only for what he did, but also for the man he was. A brave, noble man, who never blinks at the sight of danger.
"And then Nemesis Jax smashed his head in like this!"

Why, Jax, why did you do this?

Or, in the more common way of saying this, "Jax y u do dis :("
He stood brave even while Sion loomed over him, preparing to kill him.
Not even a flinch... Why, Rito, WHY? WHY????????????????????????????? *Bursts into tears*
Let the voices of all the Runtera unite when they call his name. When they sing the story not just fo this man but of what he represented.
He always helped the poor and miserable. He always helped the ones in need. I shed a tear at his memory.
That... was beautiful. Brought a {{item:3070}} to my eye.
I think riots sending us a message... even helmet bro can't survive the new jungle... BEWARE!
Even the great and powerful, unstoppable Helmet Bro. ;)

WHAT DO YOU KNOW? I KNOW YOU'RE HIDING SOMETHING! TELL ME! TELL ME!!!!


Is Helmet Bro an upcoming champion?
Say yes say yes cause I need to know...
Very unlikely! I just think its just a nod to what has become a running joke! much like Urf!
Lee Sin was a running gag for years! HELMET BRO 2015!
# #BelieveHelmetBro
OMG, is Helmet Bro the Wizard of Oz? Or Trixie?

> I think riots sending us a message... even helmet bro can't survive the new jungle... BEWARE!

BUT........ I main jungle ;-; *crying forever*
See? only Amumu, the Sad Mummy, is capable of surviving the damn chickens.
O SHT THEY ARE TRYING TO HATCH A HELMET BRO
is there another one in the nest on the right?
No there isn't...
must be an egg or the nest itself then.
look at the picture! thats definitely a helmet!!
i meant the one i thought i saw on the right. the one you pointed out is a helmet for sure.
OH!!! Ya i didn't find anything  else of significance beside Excalibur near the top lane!!!!!

> OH!!! Ya i didn't find anything  else of significance beside Excalibur near the top lane!!!!!

....

> OH!!! Ya i didn't find anything  else of significance beside Excalibur near the top lane!!!!!

That Excalibur though. I laughed.

Yeah it's known, look at the kog maw splash art 
http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Ml9wq16ivwA/VCxVwpkt8KI/AAAAAAAAaLs/xgbLMTSqJUI/s1600/KogMaw_Splash_0.jpg

> Yeah it's known, look at the kog maw splash art 
> http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Ml9wq16ivwA/VCxVwpkt8KI/AAAAAAAAaLs/xgbLMTSqJUI/s1600/KogMaw_Splash_0.jpg

oh thanks for saving me a post. 


But yeah i just went on the PBE to see this and yeah, it checks out. That's a Helmet for damn sure but is it Helmet Bro's?

Even if it is, does that mean he's dead, he could of easily escaped the Razorbeaks but Kog is a different story. You can see in the art that Kog seems very curious. Maybe he thinks he landed the shot and he obliterated Helmet Bro or he eat the body leaving the helmet, Kog could of even just stumbled upon this Helmet with his drool. Many questions, yet no answers.

Either way this all proves that the art team has more consistency than any other team at Riot GJ Art team.
Its in the general shape of Helmet Bros helmet. I don't think there is any reason to NOT think it is!! If not his, who's is it????

> Its in the general shape of Helmet Bros helmet. I don't think there is any reason to NOT think it is!! If not his, who's is it????

Random Soldier 1138
+1 for the clutch find
May he live on in the icons.  RIP in peace.

> May he live on in the icons.  RIP in peace.

wait a second...... ICONS WHEN WHAT WHERE HOW

> May he live on in the icons.  RIP in peace.

As if he's dead :P
Helmet bro graciously gave his helmet to help them build their nest as he is a great guy. He later put on another of his helmets.

You know he's going to have to be made into a champion sooner or later just like lee sin. 

Just like lee sin he's also going to be the most popular champion evar.
WHAT DOES HE KNOW?!?!?!?!?!?!?
Helmet bro got eaten by Razorbeaks, Champion cancelation confirmed. R.I.P. Helmet Bro.
I will always destroy those birds first thing when I jungle
Good luck, they deal ~~tons~~ lots of damage.
Puns of damage
What a Phreak
You all laugh now, but I'm calling it. Helmet Bro is going to be the final boss of League.
This isn't even my final form -------> Helmet Bro Final Boss Veigar skin update confirmed.
Helmet Bro you say? (Look at mini-map)
For some reason this has made me laugh

Score another one for the art team.

Maybe it's time they drop the lore team, and let the art team write all the lore in their off-time.

> Score another one for the art team.
> 
> Maybe it's time they drop the lore team, and let the art team write all the lore in their off-time.

What lore team?
